articles.title: Microsoft invests billions in ChatGPT-maker OpenAI
articles.description:
(marketscreener.com) Microsoft Corp has said it is making a "multi-year, multi billion-dollar investment" in the artificial intelligence start-up OpenAI Inc, the maker of ChatGPT and other tools that can write readable text and generate new images.
